This course provides a foundation in the principles and practice of quantitative social science, with a focus on building tools to make descriptive, causal, and predictive inferences. 

# Logistics

We meet three times a week from 12-12:50pm with lectures on Monday and Wednesday and lab sessions on Friday. You will need a laptop that can run R and Rstudio for both lectures and labs. test
